duties_responsibilities.duty: Deliver parts to commercial customers and assist with task and inventory processes in the store.
Support DIY business and achieve sales and service objectives with basic automotive system knowledge and basic part knowledge.
Provide advanced automotive problem resolution and project assistance for DIY customers with expert knowledge of store operations and parts.
Support advanced functions of the DIY business with expert knowledge of store systems and parts.
Support advanced functions for both DIY and DIFM with expert knowledge of store systems and parts.
Support basic and advanced functions on DIY and professional business, prepare for a General Manager role.
Lead and direct with the knowledge of store systems and expert knowledge of automotive systems and parts.
